prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Defunc True Music TWS Earbuds
features: 13mm Optimised Driver for deeper bass, crisp clear, and seamless sound
Bluetooth v5.2 provides high efficiency and high-speed connection
With microphones great for making phone calls for several reasons
Premium and stylish looks make it more attractive and very impressive
sub_features: Do you want to hear great sound with great sound quality? Get the Defunc True Music TWS Earbuds. It offers a truly wireless experience with Bluetooth v5.2 connectivity which provides Instantaneous pairing with a smartphone, as soon as you open the charging case lid. Powered by 13mm optimized drivers, you'll feel like you're right in the middle of the action every time a shot or grenade blast hits your ears. The Defunc True Music TWS Earbuds have a wide range of features to make listening more comfortable and enjoyable to suit your particular listening style.

The Defunc True Music TWS Earbuds provide a long-lasting and comfortable listening experience that is perfect for everyday use. These earbuds have a highly sensitive touch control and they are IPX4 water and sweat resistant. Comes with fast charging and a total of 22 hours of playtime for comfortable and seamless listening. These earbuds feature an in-house developed consumer-insights multi-chip design, ensuring long-lasting comfort and a secure fit. Perfect for users who value a seamless audio experience. So, grab these Defunc True Music TWS Earbuds, online!

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
